page.title: 03INDUSTRY CONTINUED
page.content: 60 people and makes paper tubes. The paper tubes are used mainly in the {textile}trade so a link is retained with the areas main industry in the past. Two firms in the area are connected with the building trade. K.Kay employ upto 60 people. Sandersons make garages and garden sheds. Another small firm is Irvin Scott which employs only twelve people and makes items out of elastic. The oldest established firm in Milnrow is John Hall which has been in existence for 161 years. This firm specialises in importing felt which is then used to make hats and billiard cloth. In Newhey there are several small engineering firms.
